stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
In answering the questions, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

The government replaces the income tax with a national sales tax that generates the same revenue. Assume throughout the question that the economy stays at full employment.

  1. What is the effect of the change in tax policy on each of the following?

    1. Consumption

    2. National saving

  2. Using a correctly labeled graph of the loanable-funds market, explain how the change in tax policy will affect each of the following.

    1. Real interest rate

    2. Investment

  3. Explain how this change in policy will affect long-run economic growth.
